title: Is your data actually safe?
content: In today's digital age, data security is more important than ever. But are you sure your data is protected from cyber threats?
image_prompt: Create Realistic cinematic visualization to explain Local RAG Security. Conceptual representation using geometric shapes and flowing glass. Soft studio lighting, deep depth of field with bokeh, metallic and translucent textures. Professional color palette. 8k resolution, photorealistic. NO TEXT, NO LOGOS, NO SIGNS, NO WORDS.

title: The risks of Cloud AI
content: When you store your data in the cloud, you risk meta-data leaks and unauthorized access. Is your data really safe in the cloud?
image_prompt: Create a futuristic representation of cloud computing using abstract shapes and neon lights. Depict data flowing through the cloud, with cracks and gaps to represent potential security risks. 8k resolution, photorealistic.

title: The API breach risk
content: When you connect your APIs to the cloud, you create a potential entry point for hackers. Are your APIs secure?
image_prompt: Visualize a cyber attack on an API using a dramatic and dark color palette. Represent the API as a lock with glowing red lines to indicate a potential security breach. 8k resolution, photorealistic.

title: Introducing our Local-First RAG solution
content: Our Local-First RAG solution keeps your data safe and secure on your local devices. No more worrying about cloud AI leaks or API breaches.
image_prompt: Create a representation of a local device (e.g. a server or a computer) using a combination of geometric shapes and metallic textures. Depict data flowing through the device, with locks and shields to represent security. 8k resolution, photorealistic.

content: One of our clients achieved 100% data residency using our Local-First RAG solution. Read the full case study to learn more.
